data.name: Additional Mikasa Costume: Festival Outfit
data.detailed_description:
A new costume for Mikasa is added.
A costume based on a festival theme. Enjoy battles and daily life sections in new fashion.

▼How to use
You can access the new costume by performing either of the following:
1. Select "Another Mode" on the main menu, and then select Mikasa.
Change into the costume "Festival Outfit" by selecting "Character Editor" when you are near the tent on the field.
2. Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then approach Mikasa in the Daily Life section.
Change into the costume "Festival Outfit" by selecting "Change outfit" when you are near Mikasa.
